long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take the hassle out of researching Amazon sellers with our powerful Chrome extension. Designed specifically for savvy online shoppers, eCommerce professionals, and casual browsers alike, this extension simplifies the process of gathering critical Amazon seller information. Simply right-click on a seller's name and choose the "Search Amazon Seller Information" option from the context menu; our extension does the rest.

Are you a buyer looking to ensure your next Amazon purchase is from a reputable seller? Or perhaps you're a competitor aiming to analyze other sellers in your niche? Either way, this tool offers a streamlined approach to gathering useful insights. Within seconds, get access to key metrics such as ratings, reviews, product range, and more. Gain the upper hand in your shopping or business decisions by instantly acquiring the information you need, directly from your Chrome browser.

Built on a robust and fast engine, our extension doesn't compromise on accuracy or speed. It integrates seamlessly into your browsing experience, requiring minimal permissions and maintaining your privacy. Skip the tedious manual search process; this extension brings seller information to your fingertips with just a right-click.

Try it now and empower your Amazon experience with on-the-fly, in-depth seller analytics.
